author: cnbc.com
title: Thrive CEO to Present at Kaseya Accelerate M&A Symposium
text:
FOXBOROUGH, Mass., Feb. 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Thrive Networks, a leading provider of next generation managed services with offices in New York, Massachusetts, California and South Carolina, is pleased to announce that CEO, Rob Stephenson will be a featured speaker at the Kaseya Accelerate M&A Symposium in Ft. Lauderdale, FL on Thursday, February 8, 2018. Mr. Stephenson will be sharing his technology transaction experience with the Kaseya MSP community in the afternoon session. The forum is specifically designed to provide valuable insight to Kaseya's clients on today's active merger and acquisition environment.
"Having completed three MSP acquisitions at Thrive over the past 15 months, I'm honored to have the opportunity to share our insight related M & A best practices with the Kaseya forum attendees," said Stephenson. "As the volume of outside capital continues to increase within our sector, it's important from both sides of the table to fully comprehend the ideal components and value creation levers which epitomize successful transactions."
About Thrive
Thrive is a leading next generation managed services provider. The Thrive technology solutions suite utilizes Cloud, Cyber Security, Networking, Disaster Recovery and other pioneering managed services to help compliance-driven businesses solve complex IT issues. Thrive was acquired by M/C Partners in 2016 as a Northeast United States growth platform to service the Financial Services, Healthcare, Biotech, Life Sciences, Banking and other mid-market verticals. In developing this new technology service ecosystem, Thrive is uniquely positioned to offer compliance-based solutions to its valued client base.
To learn more, visit Thrive's new and improved website www.ThriveNetworks.com and follow us on LinkedIn , Twitter , Google+ and Facebook .
